    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"

>
[Bolster Soul Cage](/Feats.aspx?ID=3517) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Lich](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=179)

**Prerequisites**
[Lich Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3513)

</column>

---

Your constant efforts to augment and perfect your [_soul cage_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1545) have bolstered its efficiency. Your _soul cage_ has Hardness equal to your level and HP equal to four times your level. The time it takes your _soul cage_ to rebuild your body is reduced to 1d6 days rather than 1d10 days.

 At 20th level, the time it takes your _soul cage_ to rebuild your body is reduced to 2d12+12 hours.
name: Bolster Soul Cage
